name: Journey with the ghost
description:
A platform puzzle game created by 4 U of M students!

Go on a incredible journey with the ghost and fight against evil!

Use the special ghost mechanism to solve puzzles and explore interesting game mechanisms!

Incredible art design and immersive experience. 

Credit of music and fonts: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DgZeiKm7NbkEfFjLS9oU9YLY7qTN5MM9GblrPSsWeLY/...
